document_data.name: Black Pits
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Pits''' was a famous [[Underdark]] fighting pit in the 1300s [[DR]], operated by the powerful [[drow]] [[sorcerer]] [[Baeloth Barrityl]].
document_data.Location: The Black Pits was located on an island somewhere in the Underdark. It was used to pit adventurers against monsters and other adventuring groups. When the contestants had won fifteen battles, they would fight the pit master themselves.
document_data.History:
[[File:Black Pits art.png|thumb|Baeloth observing his fighting pit.]]
The structure was originally dug out by [[duergar]]. When Baeloth Barrityl seized control of the area, he enslaved the original builders and established the Black Pits as a fighting pit. When Baeloth was slain by the [[Champion of Baeloth's Pits]], the duergar reclaimed the area.
